meta.purpose: Exclude lemmas that are likely false positives for clause-embedding verb sampling (e.g., psych verbs needing an object experiencer, and clear non-embedders observed near thresholds).
notes: This is a conservative filter meant to avoid generating ungrammatical matrix-verb swaps like 'Jill amazed that ...'.
Edit this list as needed; rerun scripts/build_clause_verb_whitelists.py to regenerate data/processed/clause_verb_whitelists.json.
